rating_comment: all in one word is great!

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Pros:
* Good location
* Spacious property
* Helpfull host & caretakers
* 24 Hrs access
* Secured and hassle free
* Plenty restaurants, shops and medicine stores around.
Cons:
* Handing over the property keys was a hassle, please keep it simple and accessible.
* 3 washrooms but no toilet tissues wew available.
* Please keep at least one towel available in each washroom.
* House WiFi signal was far too poor, requires immediate attention.
* Water leaking from the freezer/ chiller.
* Freezer/chiller was so dirty inside and stopped working at one point.
* Noisy neighbours, specially one who lived upstairs.
* Please keep the home interiors friendly and religion free.
I enjoyed staying in this property but would recommend the host to pay attention to the cons I have posted above to keep holiday makers stay more enjoyable.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Great host and awesome place! Had a wonderful time in Dhaka. Major shopping centres and amenities are nearby. All basic needs such as water and electricity were available 24/7. Easy to park as well.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
The apartment was very nice and clean, just like the pictures. Air conditioning was working very well. The host was humble and accessible all the time. The only problem I felt is the elevator, as it is very small and does not work smoothly always. The apartment is in 5th floor, so a perfectly working and spacious elevator would be nice.
Everything else was perfect. The host was kind enough to put some food and water in the refrigerator. Would stay there again definitely!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Very tidy and lovely AirBnb apartment equipped with everything you need. A good bed and a nice bathroom. Iftakhar is a great host and there when you need him, Very nice and wants to share all he knows about the area. We had a great stay!
